alert.note: Alert for Kennebec; Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 5:13AM EST until December 21 at 10:34AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Maine... Kennebec River at Hallowell affecting Kennebec and Sagadahoc Counties. Kennebec River At Augusta affecting Kennebec County. Kennebec River At North Sidney affecting Kennebec County. Kennebec River At Skowhegan affecting Somerset and Kennebec Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kennebec River at Skowhegan. * WHEN...Until late Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 80,000.0 cfs, East River Road floods to a depth of 1 to 2 feet. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:15 AM EST Tuesday the flow was 28,493.0 cfs. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 122,540.0 cfs this morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday morning. - Flood flow is 35,000.0 cfs. &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
